rows.text:
* Discuss with your partner and other members of the family the importance of close family relationships.
* Practice interaction activities that improve family relationships by living like you have only 3 months to live with your children and spouse during the week.
rows.title: Home practice: @data.topic.family_relation.title
rows.intro_text: Time to try this at home with your family.

rows.text:
* Discuss with your partner and other family members the importance of having a defined parenting approach- refer back to the session.
* Practice parenting measures you were not doing before with your children during the week.
rows.title: Home practice: @data.topic.current_pract.title
rows.intro_text: Time to try this at home with your family.

rows.text:
* Reflect on what you learned from this topic about yourself as a parent and your parenting style. 
* Take 5 minutes every day and practice interactive play with your children in any game of their choice.
rows.title: Home practice: @data.topic.child_dev.title
rows.intro_text: Time to try this at home with your family.

rows.text:
* Reflect on the positive things you remember from your childhood relationship with your father/mother/caregiver.
* Practice one of these things with your children or family.
rows.title: Home practice: @data.topic.parent_childhood.title
rows.intro_text: Time to try this at home with your family.

rows.text: * Try to practice the new techniques for resolving conflict at home.
rows.title: Home practice: @data.topic.impact_conflict.title
rows.intro_text: Time to try this at home with your family.

rows.text: * Discuss with your partner/children about the benefits and challenges of family time together
rows.title: Home practice: @data.topic.sharing_care.title
rows.intro_text: Time to try this at home with your family.

rows.text: Reflect on the things you like and those you do not like about your marriage or family life.
rows.title: Home practice: @data.topic.healthy_relation.title
rows.intro_text: Time to try this at home with your family.

rows.text: * As you end this session, if you have school going children, identify any two of their unmet school needs and attempt to fulfill them during the week as a means to encourage them to achieve at school. Those needs should not be financial in nature.
rows.title: Home practice: @data.topic.education.title
rows.intro_text: Time to try this at home with your family.

rows.text: * Find time to go practice positive ways to discipline children and reflect together on the experience and the lessons you have taken from it.
rows.title: Home practice: @data.topic.discipline.title
rows.intro_text: Time to try this at home with your family.

rows.text: * As you end this session, reflect on the gender norms and practices that influenced your adult behaviour and parenting styles today and discuss its effects with your children and spouse; and together decide on what you should change.
rows.title: Home practice: @data.topic.gender_equal.title
rows.intro_text: Time to try this at home with your family.

rows.text: * Reflect on the positive things you remember from your adolescence stage and your relationship and communications with your parents that helped you delay sex and practice one with your children/family.
rows.title: Home practice: @data.topic.prevent_abuse.title
rows.intro_text: Time to try this at home with your family.

rows.text: * As you end this session, reflect on the ways in which you will share the knowledge you gained from this activity with your spouse, children, and neighbors.
rows.title: Home practice: @data.topic.reduce_conflict.title
rows.intro_text: Time to try this at home with your family.
